alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 23 at 9:57AM EST until December 23 at 9:02PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by previous heavy rainfall and residual tidal surge. * WHERE...A portion of northeast New Jersey, including the following county, Bergen. * WHEN...Until 100 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 951 AM EST, Gauge reports indicated water levels generally near and above minor flooding. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lyndhurst, Rutherford, Ridgefield, Fort Lee, Englewood, Teterboro, Teaneck, Cliffside Park, Palisades Park, North Arlington, Fairview, Ridgefield Park, Edgewater, Wallington, Little Ferry, Leonia, East Rutherford, Bogota, Carlstadt and Englewood Cliffs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
